text:
="preserve">Jonas Rodrigues de Mello (20 October 1937 – 18 November 2020) was a Brazilian actor. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. He was known for his roles as Shadowseat in "Cassiopeia" (1996), as Montahna in "The Happy Cricket and the Giant Bugs" (2009) and as Francisco in "A Escrava Isaura" (2004–2005).
Mello died on 18 November 2020 in São Paulo at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: The Happy Cricket and the Giant Bugs
